frameDefinitions: An Earner receives Earnings by providing Goods to a Buyer; providing the Goods also generally entails a cost, which may or may not be included in the consideration.
A Fire burns Fuel, resulting in damage and possibly complete destruction of the Fuel.
A Person or Institution is being described in terms of their wealthiness, in other words the amount of money in their possession.
This frame covers descriptions of an entire human body, viewed as a gestalt (as opposed to descriptions based on salient body parts).
A State_of_affairs is evaluated as good (or bad), against a background assumption that previously, the State_of_affairs was thought to be unlikely to occur.
An Entity is in a state such that it participates in a preponderance of states and events which are desirable for it.
frameExamples: This reflects the 15 % jump in <t><fex name='Earnings'>earnings</fex></t> over 1994 .
A fire that started on Saturday afternoon, the High Glade Fire - located on the Mendocino National Forest's Upper Lake Ranger District - continued to <t>burn</t> actively on Sunday.
In the 1920s the peach industry <t>flourished</t> in Upson County.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Earner</fen> is involved in a transaction or set of transactions as the party that receives payment.
<fen>Earnings</fen> are the money given to the <fen>Earner</fen> in a transaction, generally in exchange for <fen>Goods</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Earner</fen> makes their <fen>Earnings</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Earner</fen> makes their <fen>Earnings</fen>.

The total material currently involved in combustion, including both the parts of the <fen>Fuel</fen> currently undergoing chemical alteration and the partially ionized gas that results from this process.
The entity that is undergoing rapid chemical alteration leading to damage or destruction.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Fire</fen> is burning.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Fire</fen> is burning.
The individual or individuals whose wealthiness is being described.
A group which has (or lacks) possession of some resource.
This role identifies the individual (or individuals) being described.
This role identifies the <fen>Figure</fen> or form being described by the target.
The State of affairs that is evaluated.
The Protagonist is the one for whom the destiny is evaluated.
The <fen>Role</fen> filled by the <fen>Protagonist</fen>.
The time for which the <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s destiny is good.
The location where the <fen>Protagonist</fen> has luck.
The <t>Entity</t> is experiencing a period of desirable events or states.
This role describes the state of the <fen>Entity</fen>. It is often incorporated into the LUs of this frame.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> thrives.
The <fen>Place</fen> where the thriving takes place.
listRoleExamples: She made a lot of money <fex>in Africa</fex> .
<fex>Pat and Kim</fex> are completely broke at the moment.
I was rather fortunate <fex>in the late 90s</fex>, making much of my fortune at that time.
In the 1920s <fex>the peach industry</fex> thrived in Upson County.
He was living <fex>well</fex> after his promotion.
<fex>In the 1920s</fex> the peach industry thrived in Upson County.
Why was it that democracy flourished <fex>in America</fex>?
